name: The Hardest Dungeon
description: The Hardest Dungeon is a roguelite action role playing game that is very focused on team management and survival. Can you and your team survive this adventure in the hardest dungeon?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-7167U  @2.80 GHz, equivalent or faster Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated graphics card with 1 GB VRAM Storage: 350 MB available space Additional Notes: ©2018 Pippala Games. All Rights Reserved.
